website_summaries.verdict: Provides a formula designed for those working out regularly, improving performance.
pros: With this version of Hydroxycut, you'll receive the weight loss benefits along with caffeine to boost levels of focus and energy for workouts
Works both when used just before a workout or as a daily supplement for weight loss
cons: With high doses of caffeine and other stimulants, some people will feel jittery

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This product is great! Much like Hydroxycut Black/Platinum this is an extremely effective weight loss product. It provides a lot of energy whether you are using it before the gym or just throughout your day. The herbal blend and caffeine content really work for me. Additionally, this is a very good appetite suppressant. I'm hardly hungry when I take this stuff for a good couple of hours. Even with all these positive effects I never felt jittery or unease. Overall great supplement! I highly recommend if you are looking for something to help shed a couple of extra pounds!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Toljanic

customer_reviews.title: lose 20 lbs
customer_reviews.text: I lost 20 lbs, in 6 months, with a treadmill 3-2 times a week for 1 hour, after 6 months I rested 1 month, I repeated the dose again and I can't go down anymore, why ??
customer_reviews.author: JORGE A.

customer_reviews.title: another winner from muscletech
customer_reviews.text: the perfect amount of caffeine , I realy like this new version of hydroxy cut . im defenetly leaner while using it . dont forget to eat a healthy diet as well . and please drink plenty of water .
customer_reviews.author: marco teves

customer_reviews.title: This pills are amazing!
customer_reviews.text: It give me a lot of energy, I take two in the morning and it is enough to keep me alert and awake without feeling tired. I stop drinking a lot of coffee because this pills are great
customer_reviews.author: Mariah Sanz

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Definitely didn’t work even when I was on a diet and worked out 3times a week
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Schreiber

customer_reviews.title: Gives extra ummph to your workout
customer_reviews.text: I like taking this before I workout. It gives me extra ummph! I do feel the thermogenic effect and I notice I get even more red/ hot looking when I work hard. It can give you jitters which I don't mind
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This is yet another great Hydroxycut product. This Elite Sport version gives me an even greater intensity through my workouts and I seem to have increased energy after my workouts. No crash later on in the day though. Overall, I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: ... al the hydroxycuts and this is by far my favorite. Gives me a good energy boost to get ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used nearly al the hydroxycuts and this is by far my favorite. Gives me a good energy boost to get me through my day and curbs my cravings and keeps me from snacking. I am pretty caffeine tolerant just follow the directions to asses what you can handle
customer_reviews.author: matthew matuschek

customer_reviews.title: Epic burner, Batman!
customer_reviews.text: Epic burner, Batman. Seriously though still stuff kicks, in a good way. No jitters, no crash just appetite suppression with an added energy kick. Give it a shot, you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: J.B.

customer_reviews.title: Scam
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money. The only benefit from fat burners are that they keep you energized and awake due to the high caffeine content. Not an actual way to lose fat.
customer_reviews.author: Summer Silaghi

customer_reviews.title: Bad Batch
customer_reviews.text: The first couple times I ordered this product it worked great. I had plenty of energy and reduced my appetite. The last bottle I ordered however was not effective at all. I actually felt tired after taking it. I live in the Houston area so theres high heat and humidity so that might possibly have something to do with it. Or it might be a bad batch. I tried ordering the same product from walmart and same thing, no energy.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work at all.
customer_reviews.text: Completely ineffective, and I am not a big girl. I wasn't going to use this for weight loss. Just as an appetite suppressant.
customer_reviews.author: NmTrekker

customer_reviews.title: Great boost
customer_reviews.text: I use to takes this before training or racing, gives me a great boost, helps with breathing harder
customer_reviews.author: FAC

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. All Hydroxycut I have tried work really well this one seemed to work just as good as the rest. With exercise and a good diet this will help you take off the weight.
customer_reviews.author: Shad E. Sharkey

customer_reviews.title: This is another great fat burner/energy product
customer_reviews.text: This is another great fat burner/energy product. It gave me a pick me up without any jitters and I felt like I had better focus.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ate what I wanted and more than usual and did not gain weight.
customer_reviews.text: I've been eating whatever I wanted with little exercise. I thought I'd gain weight, but it stated around the same. The 4 star is because of g.i. side effects.
customer_reviews.author: RedPackerSox

customer_reviews.title: You need this!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product! This product has helped curb my appetite, has given me the extra energy for those extra pumps, and has helped getting that extra mile while running!
customer_reviews.author: iwalk2work

customer_reviews.title: Energy booster
customer_reviews.text: It gives me energy in the morning and suppress my hunger a little bit. Didn't lose weight yet, but I will post results after a month.
customer_reviews.author: bengielyn pucan

customer_reviews.title: Enjoyed this product a lot
customer_reviews.text: Enjoyed this product a lot. I had a lot of energy, and I could focus well while on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product, makes me feel alert and curves appetite well. I would recommend it
customer_reviews.author: ted4311

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: I felt nothing while taking this. It was no different than taking a Tylenol. No appetite control no energy literally nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Coombs

customer_reviews.title: Energy!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Took this and in 60 mins i had so much energy i felt like a 16 year old again and im 32...gave me energy to do all yard work that i didnt do last year
customer_reviews.author: Tj

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: This product is one of the best ultimate weight loss formulas in a pill! I would follow the daily recommended doses on the bottle and I was able to have a strong sensory experience when I was tired, it would help get me going and stay focused while dieting.
customer_reviews.author: Tattdbeast

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as the one before
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as the bottles I purchased before. It make me drowsy instead of hyper and energized
customer_reviews.author: Phalla vann

customer_reviews.title: Who would have thought
customer_reviews.text: Who would guess that the easiest way to lose weight is consume less than you burn and not try to buy pills that don't help... If this worked everyone would just eat these...
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Cureton

customer_reviews.title: Stay energized and focused throughout your day
customer_reviews.text: This hydroxycut next gen definitely gives me that extra energy I need during the day and helps keep me focused during workouts. I’ve probably lost 7lbs so far with this and diet and exercise. Definitely would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon A Cook

customer_reviews.title: ... your problem was cravings— this really helps with my sweet
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t have a monstrous affect but if your problem was cravings— this really helps with my sweet tooth
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Crayton

customer_reviews.title: Very good product for active people
customer_reviews.text: This stuff just works. Only one catch! Eat right and work out. Do those two things and you will see results with this product. I use this alongside Clear Muscle (another product of the brand) and I saw results after three weeks. So get after it!
customer_reviews.author: Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Not the same
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t even come close to Hydroxycut Hardcore Elite. No changes in Cutting weight or leaning out.

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Not for me, I got sick and I end up going to the hospital
customer_reviews.author: RS😻

customer_reviews.title: Another home run
customer_reviews.text: I love hydroxycut hardcore elite. Gives me energy to power through the toughest workouts and keeps my mood positive!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff
customer_reviews.text: This was great stuff!! High energy and focus. Less appetite.
customer_reviews.author: wdairyko

customer_reviews.title: Hydroxycut Hardcore Elite
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for about a week now and it has been great, I take two a day and it gives me a nice and steady energy boost throughout the day with no crash. It also helps with overeating because it suppresses your appetite so that you don't end up over eating and gaining extra weight because of it. I would highly recommend this product to people who are lacking energy throughout the day and hose who have problems with overeating because this product with help greatly with both of those issues.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Kaminski

customer_reviews.title: Problen
customer_reviews.text: good afternoon the package is not in my mailbox second problem I have with usps, q do not leave neither the package nor any information

customer_reviews.title: Expiration date too soon
customer_reviews.text: The expiration date is in less than two months, I was not planning on using it everyday so I feel like a lot will be wasted and I got an old bottle
customer_reviews.author: Jody

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product it hasn't been a week yet and I've lost 10 pounds with no exercise only a change in diet.

customer_reviews.title: Worst pills
customer_reviews.text: I dislike this product, on the first take I fell faiting and weird, DON'T buy it, I just throw it away

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Always love Hydroxycut used it for years to take off weight before vacations.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars

customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Effective boost of energy
customer_reviews.text: This product is highly effective. It gave me a great boost in energy and curbed my cravings for lots of food. I noticed the results of the boost the first day I used the product. It did not have a major crash either. The jitters did come at the beginning but once I was used to it, the jitters subsided. I highly recommend this to anyone looking for a boost and to help lose a bit of weight.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: I would definitely recommend cycling this in every several months
customer_reviews.text: My first trek into the "Elite Sport" label. I've used Hardcore and Hardcore Elite in the past, Sport was interesting solely due to that focus factor. My weight is stable, my energy levels are right where I want them to be, my mood is dialed in to sit alongside of my focus. I would definitely recommend cycling this in every several months.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Cee

customer_reviews.title: ... over a week now and I have been very happy with it thus far
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Hydroxycut Hardcore Elite for a little over a week now and I have been very happy with it thus far. I have been taking it primarily as a pre workout and it gives me a nice boost of energy without any crash in my personal use. I like that it gives me smooth and clean pump and focus, no jitters or over stimulation.
customer_reviews.author: Naya169

customer_reviews.title: the Hydroxycut Hardcore Elite was awesome. I use that version all the time and ...
customer_reviews.text: This helped me maintain my weight. I didn't see any loss. However, the Hydroxycut Hardcore Elite was awesome. I use that version all the time and I've lost 60 pounds (no joke).
customer_reviews.author: Will Corley

customer_reviews.title: Bogus claims
customer_reviews.text: Would give zero stars as I lost zero weight using this compared to not using it
customer_reviews.author: K. Selles

customer_reviews.title: As good as other hydroxycut products
customer_reviews.text: I like the formula. I have a nice energy boost from taking one tablet a day. I also take a pre workout supplement and I don't want to over do it with the caffeine. Good solid product.
customer_reviews.author: M.T.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Another great Hydroxycut product. These are very potent but they work. I would recommend really following the label for dosage. Curbs appetite and provides great energy and focus!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Was hoping this would be more effective but sadly, it wasn't.
customer_reviews.author: G. O

customer_reviews.title: Great product that provided me with all day energy for ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product that provided me with all day energy for my normal busy schedule that included strength training on top of full time work. I felt really good while using this product and it helped produce amazing energy and focus that fueled some excellent workouts. I had noticeable strength increases while at the same time shredding some body fat.
customer_reviews.author: joseph cretella

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Did absolutely nothing for me - hardcore elite works great for me.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money especially when there are alternatives
customer_reviews.text: Have been using for 4 to 5 weeks now and I have not noticed any difference! Like all other over the counter weight loss supplements, they do not work! The best supplements can to be prescribed at a weight loss clinic! I highly recommend searching for one and making an appointment.
customer_reviews.author: Brad W.

customer_reviews.title: Hydroxycut Elite Sport
customer_reviews.text: Hydroxycut Hardcore Elite Sport is a fantastic fat burner to take. I've tried many different stimulant fat burners and an array of the Hydroxycut line and all of the products are very good!. This one I think is one of the stronger ones and one that will let you know that it's working, in a good way! The Hydroxycut Black is good for beginners in the fat burner are where this is for the more advanced or have a higher caffeine tolerance. I loved the effects of this, the energy, and the focus I got throughout the day!
customer_reviews.author: Chase

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: I have used hydroxycut in the past and love it. I am constantly on the move and this gives me energy. It works for me. I think if you are sensitive to caffeine this is not the product for you.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: I like this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I like this stuff. I know these types of products have a pretty negative stereotype, but it works for me. It definitely curbs my hunger and has me snacking less. You get a little jittery in the beginning but once you build a tolerance that feeling goes away. My weight is down and I've recently started a new fitness program and the Hydroxycut definitely helps with my endurance. I have no incentive to write this review, I pay full price for this product and I'm on my fourth bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Jason B.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product with Results!!!
customer_reviews.text: Hydroxycut Hardcore Elite Sport is excellent!! Great energy within about 15 min of taking it with no jitters. It help keep my appetite in check so I didn't suffer from cravings. I've been trying to lose about 10 to 15 lbs and within 4 weeks I've been able to drop 11 lbs and 2" from my waist. I found the extra boost of energy during workouts to be very beneficial. I was more focused and intense. I have used MuscleTech products over the years, including Hydroxycut, and I can definitely say they have gotten better. If you are looking for results then you can not go wrong with Hydroxycut Hardcore Elite Sport.
customer_reviews.author: Solo

customer_reviews.title: I took the 2 pills as prescribed on the bottle but cut back to 1 pill as 2 made me shakey and feel like I was at a disco in the 80's
customer_reviews.text: If anything, these almost pep you up too much. For the first couple days, I took the 2 pills as prescribed on the bottle but cut back to 1 pill as 2 made me shakey and feel like I was at a disco in the 80's..if you catch my sniff. I am working out daily and along with drinking plenty of water(and cutting out soft drinks) I have dropped 7 pounds in 3 weeks somehow.
customer_reviews.author: Blake H.

customer_reviews.title: Stick with the elite pro
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used hydroxycut hardcore elite pro many times with great results. I thought I’d give this one a try because it cost a little more and it’s the “sport” version so it must be better right? Ummmm, no. This product did absolutely nothing. Not sure if I got the placebo batch but I just threw them in the garbage and ordered the hardcore elite pro again.
customer_reviews.author: John-Blaze

customer_reviews.title: I really like this. i have had issues with PVCs in ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like this. i have had issues with PVCs in the past using some stimulants, but this does not affect my heart. I like it and use it twice a day!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew B Kinnear

customer_reviews.title: Sweat and drench!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic sustained energy. I have taken these pills for a few days and I notice I sweat more than I usually do. Great to see the energy level is great when first taken but it stays good for about 4 to 5 hours. My gym workouts are much more lively with me sweating more. It's like being in a sauna but with the AC and fans going.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Resendez

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: There are so many varieties of hydroxy cut !! I love it... with so many , your body will never build up a tolerance. Love the energy from this , appetite was supressed as well. Def worked on taking off a few pounds that was giving me some trouble !!
customer_reviews.author: robjlarsen

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff. I've replaced my morning coffee with these ...
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff. I've replaced my morning coffee with these pills so now I get the benefits of weight loss, extra energy, and brighter teeth (no coffee stains). I only wish I had found these years earlier.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Medina

customer_reviews.title: Great magick pill
customer_reviews.text: I eat pretty regular food. A burger here and there. A donut now and then. Potatoes. Pizza. Just as long as I take my pill I can get away with a lot and still lose weight. For some reason it works better if you don’t exercise. I have lost 10 pounds in almost a month!!
customer_reviews.author: Raven Wolfmoon

customer_reviews.title: Lose Weight, Gain Energy
customer_reviews.text: Hydroxycut did it again. For years this has been the household name for weight loss supplements, but this product did even more than that for me. The energy benefits may be the best part of all, if you're serious about your fitness, then this product will not only help you drop the pounds, but it will push you to some of the best workouts of your entire life. I have always been in decent shape, but Hydroxycut is helping me reach my best body ever.
customer_reviews.author: Ty

customer_reviews.title: Hydroxycut Elite Sport is another great cutting agent
customer_reviews.text: Hydroxycut Elite Sport is another great cutting agent! I'd normally take in the morning before breakfast and workout. Definitely heightens my awareness and focus. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JGulachek

customer_reviews.title: Is elite
customer_reviews.text: I really like taking this product. I believe in the brand. They do great work. I follow the instructions according to the label. I have taken other products from hydroxycut. This one works just as well as the others. I recommend the elite sport. It gives that extra motivation to push further.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse baeza

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS PRODUCT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. After I begin using Hydroxycut Elite Sport , I found that I had more energy on physical training days. Also, abdominal fat begin to shred and I seen the transformation of my body as I beginner to cut and lean. The product helps with the appetite and helps with frequent bowel movements.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good energy, great way to curb appetite. lost 7 lbs without any changes
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great product gives me energy throughout the day! It has helped me lose weight and stay healthy!
customer_reviews.author: Austinstarkey

customer_reviews.title: Great product that really works!
customer_reviews.text: I like all of the Hydroxycut products. Elite Sport gave me a boost, helped me focus and gave me more energy. To avoid the possibility of getting jittery I drank one less cup of coffee! It definitely helped me with "evening snacking" and I would definitely recommend this product to anyone trying to "stay on track" or reach their goals.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Bottle that will hold 300 pills with 70 pills in it!!
customer_reviews.text: What a JOKE!! The container says “New Bonus Size” HUGE BOTTLE, just a waste of space!
customer_reviews.author: PATRICK WOODSIDE

customer_reviews.title: Suggested
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time trying the hydroxycut sport, my skin feels a bit tighter right now like other hydroxycut products but the energy kick was a pretty sweet addition to the ingredients. This truly is for active individuals to keep up through the day.
customer_reviews.author: Walter j

customer_reviews.title: Great for Weight Loss
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for cutting weight and boosting energy. Helps stave off hunger as well.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun S

customer_reviews.title: A boost of energy
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t have a flavor to it, obviously it’s capsule version. Gives you the boost of energy to run on the treadmill.
customer_reviews.author: Steve H.

customer_reviews.title: Great solid energy and weight loss!
customer_reviews.text: Great energy! Noticeable water weight loss. Great for a pre-workout without creatine and other additives.
customer_reviews.author: Chance Prophet

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff, this is my second bottle and i learned about it 20 or so years ago. It was the older version but i see the same, if not better results with this newer brand.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Winfree

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Highly recommend!! It does exactly what it is supposed to do which is weight loss! I look way more cut and am still getting bigger!!!
customer_reviews.author: lifting101

customer_reviews.title: Not Hardcore
customer_reviews.text: Meh! I did not experience any positive results from using this product.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gets water weight off quickly but once u stop taking it, u gain it all back
customer_reviews.author: Y. Cheremeteff

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great, but came at the wrong time. ( Girl Scout Cookies are here. Got to start again )
customer_reviews.author: J. Mcavoy

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Did not work for me as well as the regular elite. I guess I'll stick to what works
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Hydroxycut Product
customer_reviews.text: After sampling many different variations of hydroxycut I believe this is the best one. I enjoy the jolt of energy I get from this and the appetite suppression. Try it!
customer_reviews.author: KNR

customer_reviews.title: Great Great Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great Great Great product. I would recommend this to anyone whose looking to lose the last stubborn 15 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Continually Undisputed

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this new formula helps me keep my energy going and fat burning all at the same time!
customer_reviews.author: Michaelv

customer_reviews.title: Great supplement
customer_reviews.text: This weight loss/fat burner is great, the energy is long lasting and if combined with a proper diet and exercise plan, the sky is the limit.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Will use again
customer_reviews.text: Great product. The ingredient combination is like nothing else. After taking for a couple weeks now, I feel a lot more focused during my day and during my workouts. I'm currently cutting at the moment and this is really getting me over the edge.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Esper

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Delivered very quickly. Gives me so much energy when I need that boost at the gym
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
